question: 化粧
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Change</kanji> your face with <kanji>cosmetics</kanji>! This is via <vocabulary>makeup</vocabulary> or, of course, <vocabulary>cosmetics</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for <ja>化</ja> is a new reading, <ja>け</ja>. To remember this, think about someone putting on <vocabulary>makeup</vocabulary>. They finish putting it on, and then you say "<reading>K, show</reading> (<ja>けしょう</ja>) me!"
